item.title: Modern “Crime and Punishment” - Joe Sullivan and Avraham Eisenberg
item.description: News headline #1: Oct 5th 2022 Former Chief Security Officer Of Uber Convicted Of Federal Charges For Covering Up Data Breach Involving Millions Of Uber User Records News Headline #2: Oct 15th 2022 Hacker behind the Mango Markets exploit keeps $47M and returns $67M to the DeFi platform after a Mango community vote; he claims his actions were legal A high profile CISO, Sullivan, tried to do his job but ended up getting convicted in federal court.
